message.raw:
Attempt to implement multiple connection attempts and web server restart on the
rfBlaster. This requires respawning netcat upon each connection. Standalone test
script in RFBlaster_kloned.py. New method restart_kloned called by all methods
that make urllib2.urlopen calls; transition_to_buffered, check_remote_values, &
program_manual. A fair bit of boilerplate here, with the only thing differing
being the actual request.
